title: Welcome Screen → Login View
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user on the welcome screen
WHEN I tap login
THEN I should be taken to a login view

GIVEN a user on the login view

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN I enter my credentials
AND tap login
AND my credentials are correct and valid
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I should be logged into the app and advanced through the onboarding flow

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN I enter my credentials
AND tap login
AND my credentials are invalid
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I should be shown an error message and asked to try again
THEN I should be taken to the Forgot Password webflow

title: Favorite Teams
custom_preconds:
As a user going through the onboarding process, after I pass through the Welcome Screen, I must be able to select my one (1) favorite team and any number of teams to follow.

- A favorite team is the first team selected by the user. A user's Favorite team will be given elevated status throughout the app. A user may only have one favorite team
- Followed teams are any additional team the user chooses to select. A user may choose to follow as many teams as they like. Followed teams will have secondary priority throughout the app
- A user must have a favorite team to enable followed teams
- A user may choose not to set any favorite or followed teams
- Display different text based on if selecting fresh or re-setting saved data.

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN a user
WHEN I am going through onboarding
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I must be able to select a favorite team

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN a user going through onboarding
WHEN I have selected a favorite team
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I must be able to select one or more teams to follow

custom_steps_separated.content:
GIVEN a user going through onboarding
WHEN I have not selected a favorite team
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN I must be able to continue through onboarding if I choose to do so

title: Welcome Screen → Register View
custom_preconds: Given a user with a fresh install of the MLB Android app
custom_steps:
When I go through onboarding
AND I choose to register a new account by clicking Sign Up
AND I enter a date for my birthday that shows I am under 13
custom_expected: THEN I should be blocked from registering for an account

title: Paywall
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user who has not linked a subscription OR has no MLB subscription
custom_steps: WHEN I launch the app and go through onboarding AND I select a favorite team
custom_expected: THEN I will see a paywall with the onboarding target information

title: Connect Screen - player likeness removed
custom_steps:
WHEN I purchase MLB.tv in the MLB App
AND I am presented with a screen to connect my account
custom_expected: THEN I will not see an image that has a player in it
